018package org.kordamp.maven.checker;
019
020import org.apache.maven.model.Developer;
021import org.apache.maven.model.License;
022import org.apache.maven.model.Model;
023import org.apache.maven.model.Parent;
024import org.apache.maven.model.io.xpp3.MavenXpp3Reader;
025import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
026
027import java.io.File;
028import java.io.FileReader;
029import java.util.ArrayList;
030import java.util.List;
031
032/**
033 * Checks if a POM complies with the rules for uploading to Maven Central.
034 *
035 * The following blocks are required:
036 * <ul>
037 *   <li>&lt;groupId&gt;</li>
038 *   <li>&lt;artifactId&gt;</li>
039 *   <li>&lt;version&gt;</li>
040 *   <li>&lt;name&gt;</li>
041 *   <li>&lt;description&gt;</li>
042 *   <li>&lt;url&gt;</li>
043 *   <li>&lt;licenses&gt;</li>
044 *   <li>&lt;scm&gt;</li>
045 * </ul>
046 *
047 * All previous blocks may be supplied by a parent POM with the exception of &lt;artifactId&gt;.
048 *
049 * The following blocks are forbidden if {@code strict = true}
050 * <ul>
051 *   <li>&lt;repositories&gt;</li>
052 *   <li>&lt;pluginRepositories&gt;</li>
053 * </ul>
054 *
055 * @see <a href="http://maven.apache.org/repository/guide-central-repository-upload.html">http://maven.apache.org/repository/guide-central-repository-upload.html</a>
056 * @see <a href="https://central.sonatype.org/pages/requirements.html">https://central.sonatype.org/pages/requirements.html</a>
057 *
058 * @author Andres Almiray
059 * @since 1.0.0
060 */
061public class MavenCentralChecker {
062    /**
063     * Checks the resolved model of the given MaveProject for compliance.
064     *
065     * @param log     the logger to use.
066     * @param project the project to be checked.
067     * @param release if {@code true} checks if version is not -SNAPSHOT.
068     * @param strict  if {@code true} checks that &lt;repositories&gt; and &lt;pluginRepositories&gt; are not present
069     * @throws PomCheckException if the POM is invalid
070     */
071    public static void check(Logger log, MavenProject project, boolean release, boolean strict) throws PomCheckException {
072        Model fullModel = project.getModel();
073        Model originalModel = project.getOriginalModel();
074
075        List<String> errors = new ArrayList<>();
076
077        // sanity checks. redundant?
078        log.debug("Checking <groupId>");
079        if (isBlank(fullModel.getGroupId())) {
080            errors.add("<groupId> can not be blank.");
081        }
082        log.debug("Checking <artifactId>");
083        if (isBlank(fullModel.getArtifactId())) {
084            errors.add("<artifactId> can not be blank.");
085        }
086        log.debug("Checking <version>");
087        if (isBlank(fullModel.getVersion())) {
088            errors.add("<version> can not be blank.");
089        }
090
091        log.debug("Checking <name>");
092        if (isBlank(fullModel.getName())) {
093            String parentName = resolveParentName(project.getFile().getParentFile(), fullModel);
094            if (isBlank(parentName)) {
095                errors.add("<name> can not be blank.");
096            } else {
097                log.warn("<name> is not defined in POM. Will use value from parent: " +
098                    System.lineSeparator() + "\t" + parentName);
099            }
100        }
101
102        log.debug("Checking <description>");
103        if (isBlank(fullModel.getDescription())) {
104            errors.add("<description> can not be blank.");
105        }
106        if (isBlank(originalModel.getDescription())) {
107            log.warn("<description> is not defined in POM. Will use value from parent: " +
108                System.lineSeparator() + "\t" + fullModel.getDescription());
109        }
110
111        log.debug("Checking <url>");
112        if (isBlank(fullModel.getUrl())) {
113            errors.add("<url> can not be blank.");
114        }
115        if (isBlank(originalModel.getUrl())) {
116            log.warn("<url> is not defined in POM. Will use computed value from parent: " +
117                System.lineSeparator() + "\t" + fullModel.getUrl());
118        }
119
120        if (release) log.debug("Checking if version is not snapshot");
121        if (release && fullModel.getVersion().endsWith("-SNAPSHOT")) {
122            errors.add("<version> can not be -SNAPSHOT.");
123        }
124
125        log.debug("Checking <licenses>");
126        if (fullModel.getLicenses() != null) {
127            if (!fullModel.getLicenses().isEmpty()) {
128                // verify that all licenses have <name> & <url>
129                for (int i = 0; i < fullModel.getLicenses().size(); i++) {
130                    License license = fullModel.getLicenses().get(i);
131                    if (isBlank(license.getName()) && isBlank(license.getUrl())) {
132                        errors.add("License " + i + " must define <name> and <url>.");
133                    }
134                }
135            } else {
136                errors.add("<licenses> block is required but was left empty.");
137            }
138        } else {
139            errors.add("<licenses> block is required but was left undefined.");
140        }
141
142        log.debug("Checking <developers>");
143        if (fullModel.getDevelopers() != null) {
144            if (!fullModel.getDevelopers().isEmpty()) {
145                // verify that all developers have at least one of [id, name, organization, organizationUrl]
146                for (int i = 0; i < fullModel.getDevelopers().size(); i++) {
147                    Developer developer = fullModel.getDevelopers().get(i);
148                    if (isBlank(developer.getId()) &&
149                        isBlank(developer.getName()) &&
150                        isBlank(developer.getOrganization()) &&
151                        isBlank(developer.getOrganizationUrl())) {
152                        errors.add("Developer " + i + " must define at least one of <id>, <name>, <organization>, <organizationUrl>.");
153                    }
154                }
155            } else {
156                errors.add("<developers> block is required but was left empty.");
157            }
158        } else {
159            errors.add("<developers> block is required but was left undefined.");
160        }
161
162        log.debug("Checking <scm>");
163        if (fullModel.getScm() == null) {
164            errors.add("The <scm> block is required.");
165        }
166
167        log.debug("Checking <repositories>");
168        if (null != originalModel.getRepositories() && !originalModel.getRepositories().isEmpty()) {
169            if (strict) {
170                errors.add("The <repositories> block should not be present.");
171            } else {
172                log.warn("The <repositories> block should not be present.");
173            }
174        }
175
176        log.debug("Checking <pluginRepositories>");
177        if (null != originalModel.getPluginRepositories() && !originalModel.getPluginRepositories().isEmpty()) {
178            if (strict) {
179                errors.add("The <pluginRepositories> block should not be present.");
180            } else {
181                log.warn("The <pluginRepositories> block should not be present.");
182            }
183        }
184
185        if (!errors.isEmpty()) {
186            StringBuilder b = new StringBuilder("\nThe POM file\n")
187                .append(project.getFile().getAbsolutePath())
188                .append("\ncannot be uploaded to Maven Central due to the following reasons:\n");
189            for (String s : errors) {
190                b.append(" * ").append(s).append("\n");
191            }
192
193            throw new PomCheckException(b.toString());
194        } else {
195            log.info("POM {} passes all checks. It can be uploaded to Maven Central.", project.getFile().getAbsolutePath());
196        }
197    }
198
199    private static String resolveParentName(File directory, Model fullModel) {
200        Parent parent = fullModel.getParent();
201
202        while (parent != null) {
203            if (isNotBlank(parent.getRelativePath())) {
204                File pomFile = new File(directory, parent.getRelativePath());
205                if (!pomFile.getName().endsWith("pom.xml")) {
206                    pomFile = new File(pomFile, "pom.xml");
207                }
208
209                if (pomFile.exists()) {
210                    MavenProject parentProject = readProject(pomFile);
211                    Model parentModel = parentProject.getModel();
212                    if (isNotBlank(parentModel.getName())) {
213                        return parentModel.getName();
214                    } else {
215                        directory = pomFile.getParentFile();
216                        parent = parentModel.getParent();
217                    }
218                } else {
219                    // parent should be available from a repository
220                    // TODO: resolve parent
221                    return null;
222                }
223            } else {
224                // check 1 level up
225                File pomFile = new File(directory, "../pom.xml");
226                if (pomFile.exists()) {
227                    MavenProject parentProject = readProject(pomFile);
228                    Model parentModel = parentProject.getModel();
229                    if (isNotBlank(parentModel.getName())) {
230                        return parentModel.getName();
231                    } else {
232                        directory = pomFile.getParentFile();
233                        parent = parentModel.getParent();
234                    }
235                } else {
236                    // parent should be available from a repository
237                    // TODO: resolve parent
238                    return null;
239                }
240            }
241        }
242
243        return null;
244    }
245
246    private static MavenProject readProject(File pom) {
247        try {
248            FileReader reader = new FileReader(pom);
249            MavenXpp3Reader mavenReader = new MavenXpp3Reader();
250            return new MavenProject(mavenReader.read(reader));
251        } catch (Exception e) {
252            throw new IllegalArgumentException(e);
253        }
254    }
255
256    private static boolean isBlank(String str) {
257        if (str == null || str.length() == 0) {
258            return true;
259        }
260
261        for (char c : str.toCharArray()) {
262            if (!Character.isWhitespace(c)) {
263                return false;
264            }
265        }
266
267        return true;
268    }
269
270    private static boolean isNotBlank(String str) {
271        return !isBlank(str);
272    }
273}
